version_description:
- Brand new match experience, try our new instructions out. "Serve the fire" or "be a wall" to defeat your opponent
- A Facebook connection now gives you 30 tokens, and yes, it is retroactive ;)
- Gradually get even more rewards as your player progresses
- You have a new way to refill your various bars, find out how ;)
- Fixed bugs and optimizations
Thank you all for your feedbacks! You are the best ;)

- New ‘search new talents’ screen
- At each end of season, new recap of the past season
- At each start of set, you will see a stats highlight of your previous set
- You can now speed the consolidation animation of your characteristics up at the end of a tournament
- Fixed bugs and optimizations

- New improvements in match simulation
- Plenty of new user-friendly interfaces
- Fixed bugs and optimizations
Thank you all for your feedbacks! You are the best!

- Maximum action points increased from 100 to 120!
- Action points refill faster
- Bug fixes and optimizations
- Thanks a lot for all your feedback! You guys rock!

- The 3 regions from the Tennis Live Arena are now grouped into one
- You can now send your player to the match without coaching him, if you are sure of yourself ;)
- New wildcard system for tournaments
- Improved tournament choices for other players in the pro circuit
- Bug fixes and optimization

- The 3 regions from the Tennis Live Arena are now grouped into one
- You can now send your player to the match without coaching him, if you are sure of yourself ;)
- New wildcard system for tournaments
- Improved tournament choices for other players in the pro circuit
- Bug fixes and optimization

- The 3 regions from the Tennis Live Arena are now grouped into one
- You can now send your player to the match without coaching him, if you are sure of yourself ;)
- New wildcard system for tournaments
- Improved tournament choices for other players in the pro circuit
- Bug fixes and optimization

- Customization is now live! The style on court, it’s important as well ;)
- Assistant Coach improvement: a custom advice according to the match context!
- Bug fixes and optimization

- New daily bonus rewards!
- Changing Room: price adjustment for outfits, good time to change your dressing style!
- Tennis Live Arena : additional player slots and improved matchmaking
- Bug fixes and optimization
Thank you for all your feedbacks!

- Men and women tour should now be more realistic than ever!
- New sponsors system: more like big signing bonus or victory bonus?
- Playing style rebalance and improvement on the player’s behavior for serve and return.
- New Tennis Live Arena event!

- Matchmaking improvement
- Bug fixes and optimization for Iphones 6/5s

- Quick training: need an advice for your training? Ask Patrick, he will be happy to help you!
- Staffs price reduced but they now want a percentage revenue of your tournaments! Business is business.
- A whole new tutorial! Starting your manager career has never been so simple!
- Reducing the serve and volley playing style effectiveness on clay!

A new tennis season will be starting with this new incredible update!
During the French Open, enjoy a dedicated Tennis Live Arena season with big rewards and gifts (yes! real gifts!)
Good luck on the Tennis Manager courts! Sportingly yours, the team!

The new tennis Manager update is there, just in time for the US Open.
Experience new features and a new exclusive event !
- Manage untill 4 players in your Pro Team
- Scout new promising young tennis players in your Youth Camp
- New home screen: becoming your business operations center
- And a new PvP mode in Tennis Live Arena with amazing rewards!
Good luck on our courts Managers!
The team.

New! You can now scout young talents with the criteria of your choice (gender, playing style, country) to integrate them into your Youth Center.
Will you find the rare gem?

New! We bring some improvements on how mental works according to players' respective rankings, for ever more realistic matches.
In addition to that, many bugs have been fixed, and performance improvements have been done.
Good luck on the Tennis Manager courts! Sportingly yours, the team!

Several fixes & Discover the Halloween collection in the locker room!
Good luck on our courts Managers ;)

We’ve worked hard during the off-season to provide with TENNIS MANAGER 2020 a new reference for tennis lovers and sports management games’ fans.
* New simulation parameters
* New 3v3 PVP mode
* Faster loadings
Good luck on our courts Managers ;)

Roland Garros has started. Join the biggest tennis court in the world. Compete in the most exciting live multiplayer tournament. Get rewards and trophies, gain points. Become the best tennis Manager in the world at the end of the professional season.

Wimbledon is coming! Join the biggest tennis court in the world.
- Better matchmaking in Player Vs Player mode.
- Some UI improvements

Be ready for the next major events in Tennis Live Arena with US Open and Roland Garros!
Good luck on the Tennis Manager courts!
Sportingly yours, the team!
